item.content:encoded:
Early today, an announcement was made on the official Twitter account of Charaani and POP culture online store “Chara-ani.com” regarding the opening of pre-orders for the ” Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020” Fluffy Plushie.

ã€äºˆç´„é–‹å§‹ã€‘

é›ªãƒŸã‚¯2020 ã©ã§ã‹ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒœãµã‚ãµã‚ã¬ã„ãã‚‹ã¿

è©³ã—ãã¯â†’https://t.co/5w7H0raQzJã€€

ä»Šå¹´ã‚‚ç™»å ´ä¸‰æœˆå…«æ—¥ã•ã‚“ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ¡ãƒ‡ã‚¶ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®ã©ã§ã‹ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒœãµã‚ãµã‚ã¬ã„ãã‚‹ã¿äºˆç´„é–‹å§‹#åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ #é›ªãƒŸã‚¯ #SNOWMIKU2020 #ã•ã£ã½ã‚é›ªã¾ã¤ã‚Š #hatsunemiku pic.twitter.com/O7Nn2a9ucT

— ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ©ã‚¢ãƒ‹ã€å…¬å¼ã€‘ (@charaani) February 17, 2020

With a scheduled release date for June 2020, the very cute Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020 plushie is available to pre-order on their official website for only 9,900 yen!

  • The reservation period lasts from February 17, 2020 12:00:00 JPT to February 27, 2020 23:59:00 JPT.
  • There’s a limit of 5 items per person
  • Payment methods include Credit Card / Cash on Store / BOOK â˜† WALKER ID payment & BitCash
Coming this year as well, Snow Miku will be featured as another stuffed animal with a “deformed” design. More news of her arrival will come on March 8, 2020.

Sources

Charaani Official Store

The post “Jumbo Stuffed Snow Miku 2020” Fluffy Plushie Pre-Orders Have Begun! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.” Is Available For Pre-Order!

The plush toy has been carefully designed to include all the fine details of her costume, so expect a high fidelity product when you purchase it! Be advised that you will have a limited amount of time to purchase …

The post “Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.” Is Available For Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A plushie of Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.Â has made its appearance in Gift ONLINE SHOP!

The plush toy has been carefully designed to include all the fine details of her costume, so expect a high fidelity product when you purchase it!

Be advised that you will have a limited amount of time to purchase this awesome plush of Hatsune Miku, keeping in mind this is a limited quantity product! We’ve got all the details below:

  • Pre-Order Dates: From February 14, 2020 @ 18:00 PM JPT on to February 25, 2020
  • Shipping Time: Scheduled to ship around mid-March 2020
  • Purchase Limit: 3 per person
  • Price: 4,400 yen (tax included)

“Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.” is available here.

Make sure to get your plushie before it’s too late! Here at VNN we’re eager to see your comments regarding this cute Hatsune Miku toy!

Sources

Gift Online Shop on Twitter

The post “Snow Miku Plush Snow Parade Ver.” Is Available For Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Winter Night Vivace” Event To Take Place On February 7th, 2020!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
It’s been quite a spectacular week of announcements regarding different shows and events taking place all over Japan and today is no exception about reporting one more event that’s shaping up to be as cool as the other ones. The “Winter Night Vivace” event will be taking place tomorrow February 7, 2020 and we are …

The post “Winter Night Vivace” Event To Take Place On February 7th, 2020! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s been quite a spectacular week of announcements regarding different shows and events taking place all over Japan and today is no exception about reporting one more event that’s shaping up to be as cool as the other ones.

The “Winter Night Vivace” event will be taking place tomorrow February 7, 2020 and we are here to tell you all the juicy details!

The doors to the venue will open at 18:00 PM (Japan Time) and thirty minutes later the show will begin. In terms of directions, the venue used for this event is the well known Sound Lab Mole in the heart of Sapporo, Hokkaido.

We also know that the event is about three hours long with lots to absorb and enjoy!

Pre-sale tickets are currently going for 3,900 JPY, however, they are currently sold out. (Limited 2 per person)

Important Information for Attendees

  • There’s a Â¥ 500 fee collected at the entrance for drinks. (Alcohol is not allowed)
  • No food is allowed inside the venue.
  • Smoking is prohibited.
  • Considering the venue is going to be very crowded, any kind of large bags will not be accepted so it is recommended to travel light.

Merchandise For Sale

There are a few merchandises available for sale at the event to pick out from and we’ll show you what you can expect once you get there!

Â  Â  Â  Â Winter Night Vivace Long Sleeve Shirt – Â¥ 4,500 (Available in M, L and XL)

Â  Â  Â  Â Winter Night Vivace A5 sticker Set – Â¥ 700

Winter Night Vivace Penlight-Â¥ 2,000

Lineup

The lineup for the event is Camellia, sasakure.UK, TeddyLoid, Hachiya Nanashi and last but not least, DJ Mikudayo and MC Yukine!

We expect to find some more awesome goodies at the event itself!

Sources

Snow Miku on Twitter

Sound Lab Mole Official Website

The post “Winter Night Vivace” Event To Take Place On February 7th, 2020! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku + Magical Mirai 2019 Blu-ray & DVD Available At SNOW MIKU 2020 Plus Additional Goodies!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
The Hatsune Miku + Magical Mirai 2019 Blu-ray & DVD will be available for purchase at two SNOW MIKU 2020 venues according to official sources. These venues include the one in Odori 11 Street and the one at the Sapporo Factory Hall. Additionally, you’ll be able to purchase some new amazing products such as the …

The post Hatsune Miku + Magical Mirai 2019 Blu-ray & DVD Available At SNOW MIKU 2020 Plus Additional Goodies! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The Hatsune Miku + Magical Mirai 2019 Blu-ray & DVD will be available for purchase at two SNOW MIKU 2020 venues according to official sources. These venues include the one in Odori 11 Street and the one at the Sapporo Factory Hall.

Additionally, you’ll be able to purchase some new amazing products such as the SNOW MIKU 2020 “Sparkling Star” MV Bromide Set for ï¿¥1,600 (tax included) and the SNOW MIQUEST 2020 Mystery Solving Kit for Â¥ 1,500 (tax included) directly at each venue.

For more information regarding other cool products you can purchase make sure to click here!

Below you can find some images of these beautifully produced products:

The SNOW MIKU 2020 festival in Hokkaido seems to be shaping up to be an incredible experience! How excited are you? Let us know in the comments!

Sources

SNOW MIKU 2020 Official Website

SNOW MIKU 2020 on Twitter

The post Hatsune Miku + Magical Mirai 2019 Blu-ray & DVD Available At SNOW MIKU 2020 Plus Additional Goodies! appeared first on VNN.

item.content:encoded:
Hatsune Miku Mobile is holding an in-game gift campaign that allows you to obtain amazing goods and deals for SNOW MIKU 2020, according to official sources.

ã€ãƒŸã‚¯ãƒ¢ãƒã€‘åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ãƒ¢ãƒã‚¤ãƒ«ã§ã¯ã‚¹ã‚´å¾—é™å®šã§SNOW MIKU 2020ã®ç´ æ•µãªã‚°ãƒƒã‚ºã‚’GETã§ãã¡ã‚ƒã†ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¼ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒšãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚’å®Ÿæ–½ä¸­ï¼å¿œå‹ŸæœŸé–“ã¯1/31 11:00ï½2/13 11:00ã¾ã§ï¼ã¾ãšã¯è¦‹ã¦ã¿ã¦â™ªhttps://t.co/rQhPxB1QvT
#åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ #é›ªãƒŸã‚¯ #ãƒŸã‚¯ãƒ¢ãƒ #ã‚¹ã‚´å¾— pic.twitter.com/82SAWPs5xz

— åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ å…¬å¼ (@cfm_miku) February 3, 2020

These goods include luxurious content that is exclusive to SNOW MIKU 2020 and we’ll detail them below:

  • “Sapporo Snow Festival” at 11th Street, Odori Venue featuring a new snow statue map of “Snow Miku Snow Parade Ver.”
  • TeddyLoid will be appearing at the â€œWinter Night Vivace !!â€ club event on Friday, February 7, 2020.
  • Limited production album “Planet Traveler feat. Hatsune Miku” will be released.
  • Limited production album made by the label KARENT will be released again this year alongside a special CD featuring the “SNOW MIKU 2020” theme song “Pikapaka no Hoshi” and many other songs that were recorded just for this.

We’re surely very excited for what’s to come and we cannot wait to check this amazing content as it releases! Let us know what you think in the comments!

The post Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo X Snow Miku Collaboration appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
We see a lot of collaborations using Snow Miku lately, of course, it is that time of year! With that being said, we can also find Snow Miku cheering on the football team (soccer) Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo.

 

The new illustration done by ã¸ã¡ã¾ features Snow Miku wearing the team jersey with a number 39 on it. Not only that but you can find Snow Miku cheering the team on at the Saporro Dome on November 23rd, 2019. Kickoff starts at 14:00 (Japan time). If you are in the area or can find somewhere to watch the game, make sure to not miss out!

Source: Hatsune Miku Official Blog

The post Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo X Snow Miku Collaboration appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Snow Miku X Torikae Boot Covers
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
You will soon be able to buy Snow Miku boot covers to show your love for Miku while enjoying the wintry cold and snow. The illustration is done by æ —æ – æ­³(Kurisu Toshi). If you don’t think the covers will work well with your current boots, there is good news! You can also choose to buy …

The post Snow Miku X Torikae Boot Covers appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
You will soon be able to buy Snow Miku boot covers to show your love for Miku while enjoying the wintry cold and snow. The illustration is done by æ —æ – æ­³(Kurisu Toshi).

If you don’t think the covers will work well with your current boots, there is good news! You can also choose to buy the covers and boots as a set, that way, you can be sure that they will be a perfect fit! It also comes with a nice Snow Miku bag for you to store them when you are not wearing them.

Boot set: 19,800 JPY (tax included)

Covers only: 8,500 JPY (tax included)

Sales of both are set to begun on November 22nd, 2019 and shipments will begin in mid-December. You can make your reservations here! (Note: reservations are not open yet) Keep eye on out on Miku’s blog here for updates on when they will be open!

Source: Hatsune Miku Official Blog

 

The post Snow Miku X Torikae Boot Covers appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New SNOW MIKU SKY TOWN Upcoming Products Introduced!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hope all of our Hatsune Miku fans are ready to take their wallets in hand, because SNOW MIKU Sky TownÂ is bringing some new items on August 2nd! New Illustrations With those new items being announced Crypton Future Media also introduced to us three new artworks that will make appearance in them! This beautiful illustration of …

The post New SNOW MIKU SKY TOWN Upcoming Products Introduced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hope all of our Hatsune Miku fans are ready to take their wallets in hand, because SNOW MIKU Sky TownÂ is bringing some new items on August 2nd!

New Illustrations

With those new items being announced Crypton Future Media also introduced to us three new artworks that will make appearance in them!

This beautiful illustration of Hatsune Miku made by soå“ provides us with a refreshing design and a cutesy pose! It surely fits the season we are in!

Artworks by Mago

Matching with their polar opposite season inspiration, we also got a pair of new Snow Miku chibis as well, depicting this now well know character as she tries to cook something and eventually eat as well!

Merchandise

 

As you can see there is so much choice! Want to give a look at the price list together? Let’s do it together!

  • Notepad – 350 JPY
  • Full Graphic T-shirtÂ (Sizes: M/L/XL)Â –Â 6,000 JPY
  • Illustrated Glass –Â 800 JPY
  • Can BadgeÂ (6 variants) – 300 JPY Each (Random)
  • Stickers (3 variants, A: Natsume Eri, B: Soå“, C: Boota) –Â 350 JPY Each
  • Ballpoint Pen –Â 600 JPY
  • Mechanical Pencil –Â 600 JPY
  • Acrylic Keychain –Â 1,000 JPY
  • T-shirt –Â 2,500 JPY
  • Loose Fit T-shirt (Sizes: M/L/XL, available in two colors: Grey or Black)Â – 3,500 JPY

Taxes are not included.

Adorable isn’t it? Those items will be available startingÂ August 2nd at SNOW MIKU Sky Town‘s location! Go grab your favorite fast, before they go sold out!

Bonus Purchase

We shouldn’t be surprised to know that you will also get some extra items by reaching a certain amount of money spent at the shop, of course!

If you reach a total ofÂ 2,000 JPYÂ by buying the merchandise, you will get an adorable round-shape magnet out of the three showed above! Those cute prizes are illustrated by Boota, Yoi and Natsume Eri. Please remember that the design will be picked randomly!

And if reachÂ 6,000 JPYÂ of shopping value, you will also get a die cut magnet featuring Soå“‘s artwork!

Source

Let those amazing products lighten up your everyday life if you ever manage to go check the store! And donâ€™t forget to stay tuned with us on VNN for more virtual singer news!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese), Twitter (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese),Â YoutubeÂ andÂ Weibo
You can follow Snow Miku onÂ Twitter, too, alongside her cuteÂ Rabbit Yukine!
SNOW MIKU Sky Town Website
Press Release

 

The post New SNOW MIKU SKY TOWN Upcoming Products Introduced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Snow Miku Sky Town Vol. 2 is Open for a Limited Time!
item.dc:creator: Momoi
item.description:
Snow Miku’s Sky Town branch will be opening for just 4 days starting July 25th! Thanks to the efforts of NewDays’ collaboration with Crypton, a second run of the Sky Town in mid summer has been announced, to our pleasant surprise! åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°æ›´æ–°ã€ãã®ä»–ï¼ˆã‚°ãƒƒã‚ºï¼‰ã€‘ã€Œé›ªãƒŸã‚¯ ã‚¹ã‚«ã‚¤ã‚¿ã‚¦ãƒ³å‡ºå¼µæ‰€Vol.2ã€ãŒ7æœˆ25æ—¥ï¼ˆæœ¨ï¼‰ã‚ˆã‚Š4æ—¥é–“ã®æœŸé–“é™å®šã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ³ï¼https://t.co/c6LRQkM7IX #åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ pic.twitter.com/c5XbDNNkY2— åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ å…¬å¼ (@cfm_miku) July 18, 2019 Entry and Ticket Information …

The post Snow Miku Sky Town Vol. 2 is Open for a Limited Time! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Snow Miku’s Sky Town branch will be opening for just 4 days starting July 25th!

Thanks to the efforts of NewDays’ collaboration with Crypton, a second run of the Sky Town in mid summer has been announced, to our pleasant surprise!

Entry and Ticket Information

Now according to the official Miku Blog, the limited opening will feature new merchandise for people to purchase. Not only that, but Sky Town will be held in a venue that has a Snow Miku museum, theater, and a cafe for customers to enjoy.

Currently, special tickets are available to win online and will be used at the JR Ikebukuro Station. Otherwise, entry to Sky Town is completely free!

It should be noted that the lottery web tickets are optional, which are solely for individuals who get the opportunity to come in at an exclusive time.

Essentially, the lottery web tickets allows Hatsune Miku fans to come in at a different time each day. The tickets, which are won by chance, include a limited number of winners that will get early access to Sky Town!

Web ticket entries for customers last between 60 and 90 minute slots in the mornings and afternoons during those four days.

On the other hand, free admission for everyone goes for multiple hours each afternoon and evening! There are plenty of opportunities for all of Miku’s fans to enjoy the Sky Town experience.

New Merchandise

Along with the surprise return of Sky Town, there is also new merchandise that has been announced for release!

First, new t-shirts are up for purchase. The designs come thanks to the NewDays x Hatsune Miku collaboration.

Featured are two graphics of the NewDays Miku uniform, and a third graphic of Hatsune Miku illustrated by KEI.

The graphic tees are priced at 7,000 JPY each, including tax!

Additionally, a new set of mugs, tapestries and smartphone cases are also on sale featuring the same three variant graphics!

The mugs are priced at 1,500 JPY, the tapestries at 3,000 JPY and the phone cases are 3,500 JPY.

On top of that, customers who spend 3,900 JPY or more will receive complimentary NewDays x Snow Miku fans with their purchase!

All the pictures are courtesy of Hatsune Miku Official Blog

Finally, Crypton confirms that more merchandise will be available for purchase. As of now, this includes Miku figurines, nendoroids and apparel previously seen at Sky Town.

Unfortunately, the return of Snow Miku Sky Town is only for those four days, so there’s no telling what other surprises are in store for the fans. As a result of this special limited run, it’s important to experience Sky Town while you can!

We recommend following the blog’s advice and booking a trip to Ikebukuro to find out what NewDays and Miku have in store for you!

Sources

Don’t forget to follow us on our main social media to keep up with all the latest vocal synth news!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), Youtube and Weibo

The post Snow Miku Sky Town Vol. 2 is Open for a Limited Time! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Snow Miku & Rabbit Yukine to Join Dosanko-kun And His Friends During Dosanko ChÅnakai Summer Festival!

The post Snow Miku & Rabbit Yukine to Join Dosanko-kun And His Friends During Dosanko ChÅnakai Summer Festival! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s now time for a new collaboration involving Snow Miku and his trusted pet rabbit Yukine! This time we have the two iconic winter mascots joining forces with Dosanko-kun, in honor of their upcoming summer festival!

A Summer Festival with a Hint of Winter!

Snow Miku and Yukine will then collaborate with Dosanko-kun and his crew during Dosanko ChÅnakai Summer Festival, held in Sapporo starting July 27th until the 28th!

#ã¾ãŸãã®ã‚‚ã¿ã˜ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ ã®ã‚¿ã‚°ãŒæŠœã‘ã¦ã„ã¾ã—ãŸã®ã§ã€æ”¹ã‚ã¦å‘ŠçŸ¥ã§ã™ã€‚
ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã®çš†æ§˜ãŠè¨±ã—ãã ã•ã„m(_ _ )m#ã©ã•ã‚“ã“ç”ºå†…ä¼šå¤ç¥­ é™å®šã‚³ãƒ©ãƒœã‚°ãƒƒã‚ºã‚’å…¬é–‹ã—ã¾ã—ãŸhttps://t.co/TtCEaefNB2 â€¦#åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯#é›ªãƒŸã‚¯#ãƒ©ãƒ“ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ»ãƒ¦ã‚­ãƒ#ã‚„ã¹ãƒ¼ã¹ã‚„#ã‚¸ãƒ³ãã‚“#ã‚³ã‚¢ãƒƒã‚¯ãƒ#ã‚¢ãƒƒã‚¯ãƒ#ã©ã•ã‚“ã“ãã‚“ pic.twitter.com/pfyPO8K2ZT

— ã©ã•ã‚“ã“ç”ºå†…ä¼š å¤ç¥­ï¼ (@stv_fes) July 9, 2019

No event would be the same without merchandise and, in fact, they also announced a limited series of products made just for this collaboration! Let’s check them together!

Those adorable illustrations surely make a perfect appearance as goods, don’t they? Let’s check the price list!

  • Muffler Towel –Â 2,000 JPY
  • T-shirt –Â 2,500 JPY
  • Can Badges (32 variants) –Â 300 JPY each (picked randomly)
  • Acrylic Keychains with stand (7 variants) –Â 800 JPY each
  • Clear file –Â 250 JPY

All of these goods are actually limited to the festival and might get sold out very fast, so if you manage to attend the event and grab your favorite. it’s truly your lucky day!

Other Products

Alongside the goods we showed you above, there are some additional ones you can buy!

You will also able to findÂ Tapioca drinks priced at 500 JPY, which also includes stickers of each character as a bonus, and even a Dosanko-kun ham steak priced at 700 JPY if you’re feeling hungry all of sudden!

Source

We are eagerly waiting to see more awesome collaborations as this one! It truly brightens up our day!

As always, donâ€™t forget to stay tuned with us on VNN for more virtual singer news!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese), Twitter (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese),Â YoutubeÂ andÂ Weibo
You can follow Snow Miku onÂ Twitter, too, alongside her cuteÂ Rabbit Yukine!
Check out STV’s Dosanko ChÅnakai Summer Festival on Twitter or its official website!

The post Snow Miku & Rabbit Yukine to Join Dosanko-kun And His Friends During Dosanko ChÅnakai Summer Festival! appeared first on VNN.
